                <path d="m 128.8374,166.88664 c -6.86715,-0.50128 -12.33952,-2.21336 -17.01801,-5.32421 -7.44288,-4.94897 -11.7731,-12.94378 -12.906153,-23.82839 -0.19248,-1.84913 -0.32286,-4.97358 -0.2632,-6.30767 0.1766,-3.94906 0.32078,-5.37683 0.76946,-7.62001 1.012923,-5.06409 3.224043,-10.4213 5.770343,-13.98069 1.20612,-1.686 3.09487,-3.69433 4.82058,-5.1258 4.03221,-3.3447 9.76462,-5.967331 15.39798,-7.044724 3.68358,-0.704493 8.36323,-1.048687 11.176,-0.822007 3.98714,0.321321 8.53535,1.621344 13.41966,3.835761 4.72313,2.14134 6.226,2.19082 6.61417,0.21777 0.12615,-0.64119 0.37325,-0.941271 0.89773,-1.090222 0.89902,-0.255318 1.98354,-0.01269 2.10492,0.470912 0.0287,0.11437 -0.044,0.69493 -0.16165,1.29014 -0.40388,2.04397 -0.43853,2.51135 -0.43183,5.82353 0.007,3.27727 0.0897,4.73289 0.5121,8.97467 0.12056,1.21073 0.224,2.34242 0.22985,2.51487 0.0136,0.40038 -0.29418,0.73741 -0.99172,1.08597 -0.40565,0.20271 -0.61151,0.25143 -1.06125,0.25117 -0.95042,-5.1e-4 -1.35528,-0.38885 -1.53657,-1.47377 -0.16545,-0.99011 -0.64002,-2.82294 -1.00123,-3.86682 -1.10937,-3.206 -2.5969,-5.57185 -4.89519,-7.78556 -3.32413,-3.2018 -7.82781,-5.12167 -13.52966,-5.76753 -1.44413,-0.16359 -4.68726,-0.13965 -6.01133,0.0444 -1.2427,0.1727 -2.95109,0.58912 -4.02167,0.98028 -2.5291,0.92405 -5.45782,2.81428 -7.24509,4.67605 -4.10527,4.2764 -6.85247,11.195 -7.6929,19.37397 -0.35147,3.42042 -0.39341,8.32625 -0.0941,11.00667 0.70482,6.31189 2.43835,11.85019 4.87625,15.57867 2.16679,3.31386 4.70773,5.63364 8.07266,7.37005 3.27886,1.692 6.32167,2.36662 10.67444,2.36662 1.55171,0 1.82274,0.0186 1.82274,0.12513 0,0.35317 -2.77966,2.26943 -4.64553,3.20258 -1.68219,0.84129 -2.17589,0.95596 -3.6518,0.84822 z" fill="#008000"/>
                <path d="m 132.73206,168.60126 c -1.28596,-0.16393 -2.1863,-0.36185 -3.34154,-0.73456 -1.16497,-0.37584 -1.4858,-0.54173 -0.89179,-0.4611 1.017,0.13805 2.85537,0.1448 3.711,0.0136 2.89586,-0.44396 5.09237,-1.87573 7.10426,-4.63086 0.18985,-0.25997 0.904,-1.30557 1.58701,-2.32356 0.68301,-1.01799 1.51202,-2.21499 1.84223,-2.65999 0.68415,-0.92197 2.83824,-3.12204 3.27836,-3.34834 1.16212,-0.8929 2.38454,-1.76257 3.67462,-2.40989 1.14035,-0.56241 1.22718,-0.58301 5.36399,-1.27214 2.40147,-0.40006 3.06081,-0.53178 3.90926,-0.78099 l 0.62572,-0.1838 0.19978,0.23226 c 0.10987,0.12774 0.19859,0.2587 0.19715,0.29103 -0.001,0.0323 -0.40549,0.32548 -0.89786,0.65144 -1.08583,0.71886 -1.76032,1.42452 -2.43868,2.55139 -0.68412,1.13645 -1.10665,1.67401 -1.79358,2.28184 -2.20197,1.94847 -5.30689,3.87156 -10.06493,6.23388 -2.40546,1.19429 -2.40555,1.19672 -0.0234,0.60428 5.87277,-1.46057 12.86708,-4.92926 18.48076,-9.16518 2.13748,-1.61288 4.60858,-3.97152 6.0425,-5.76749 0.91706,-1.14861 0.90013,-1.13407 0.68822,-0.59105 -1.81912,4.66144 -6.39853,9.80609 -12.27639,13.79162 -6.00436,4.07132 -12.77901,6.77005 -19.05736,7.59164 -1.42599,0.18661 -4.75096,0.23489 -5.91931,0.086 z" fill="#008000"/>
            </g>
          </svg>
          <script>
            const tl = gsap.timeline();
          
            // Step 1: Bloom in
            tl.from(["#petal1", "#petal2", "#petal3", "#petal4"], {
              duration: 0.8,
              scale: 0,
              transformOrigin: "50% 50%",
              stagger: 0.15,
              ease: "back.out(1.7)"
            });
            // Step 2: Rotate petals after blooming
            tl.to(["#petal1", "#petal2", "#petal3", "#petal4"], {
              duration: 1.5,
              scaleX: -1,
              transformOrigin: "50% 50%",
              repeat: -1,
              yoyo: true,
              ease: "power1.inOut"
            });
          </script>                              
      </div>
      <a href="#booking" class="btn">
        <div class="wrapper">
          <p class="text">Book a FREE estimate</p>
          <!-- Flowers -->
          <div class="flower flower1"><div class="petal one"></div><div class="petal two"></div><div class="petal three"></div><div class="petal four"></div></div>

          <div class="flower flower3"><div class="petal one"></div><div class="petal two"></div><div class="petal three"></div><div class="petal four"></div></div>
          <div class="flower flower4"><div class="petal one"></div><div class="petal two"></div><div class="petal three"></div><div class="petal four"></div></div>
          <div class="flower flower5"><div class="petal one"></div><div class="petal two"></div><div class="petal three"></div><div class="petal four"></div></div>
          <div class="flower flower6"><div class="petal one"></div><div class="petal two"></div><div class="petal three"></div><div class="petal four"></div></div>
        </div>
      </a>
    </div>
  </header>

  <!-- Spacer -->
  <div class="h-16"></div>

 <!-- Panel 1 -->
<section class="panel panel-1 relative h-screen overflow-hidden">

    <!-- Background video -->
    <video autoplay muted loop playsinline class="absolute inset-0 w-full h-full object-cover z-0">
      <source src="assets/herovid.webm" type="video/webm" />
      Your browser does not support the video tag.
    </video>
  
    <!-- Optional overlay to darken video slightly -->
    <div class="absolute inset-0 bg-black opacity-40 z-0"></div>
  
    <!-- Text content centered in front of video -->
    <div class="relative z-10 h-full flex flex-col items-center justify-center text-white text-center">
      <h2 class="text-5xl font-bold drop-shadow-lg" id="headline">Premium Artificial Grass</h2>
      <p id="tagline" class="mt-4 text-xl drop-shadow-md">Crafted for elegance. Installed to perfection.</p>
    </div>
    
  </section>
  

  <!-- Additional Panels -->
  <section class="panel panel-2 bg-gradient-to-b from-indigo-800 to-purple-800 text-white">
    <div class="h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center">
      <h2 class="text-4xl font-bold">Slide 2</h2>
      <p class="mt-2">Scroll Down for next slide</p>
    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="panel panel-3 bg-gradient-to-b from-purple-800 to-pink-800 text-white">
    <div class="h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center">
      <h2 class="text-4xl font-bold">Slide 3</h2>
      <p class="mt-2">Scroll Down</p>
    </div>
  </section>

  <section class="panel panel-4 bg-gradient-to-b from-blue-200 to-indigo-100 text-black">
    <div class="h-screen flex flex-col items-center justify-center">
      <h2 class="text-4xl font-bold">Slide 4</h2>
    </div>
  </section>

  <!-- Scripts -->
  <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
  <script src="assets/gsap/gsap.min.js"></script>
  <script src="assets/gsap/SplitText.min.js"></script>

  <script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
      gsap.registerPlugin(SplitText);
  
      const split = new SplitText("#headline", {
        type: "words"
      });
  
      // Animate headline
      gsap.from(split.words, {
        opacity: 0,
        y: 100,
        rotationX: 90,
        duration: 1.5,
        ease: "back.out(1.7)",
        stagger: 0.15
      });
  
      // Animate tagline AFTER headline finishes
      gsap.from("#tagline", {
        opacity: 0,
        y: 30,
        duration: 1,
        delay: 0.6 + split.words.length * 0.15, // auto-timing
        ease: "power2.out"
      });
    });
  </script>
  

</body>
</html>
